message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Take this small slice of the pie and let's be done with this.
I'm willing to be generous too, Alice. Let's split it roughly in half and be done with it.
Bob, let's compromise. This offer gives you a good chunk of the money, and I'm willing to take a smaller share to avoid further inflation.
I'm not going to give up yet, Alice. I'll take a slightly smaller share this time, but I still want a decent chunk of the pie.
